MY DADDY

FT. FEARLESS COMMUNITY

Music Apple Spotify Deezer
Bookings

Dr. Tim Godfrey

Tim Godfrey is a Nigerian gospel singer, music director, songwriter, producer, music teacher, speaker vocal instructor, art training consultant and writer.

He received an honorary doctorate degree of fine arts, Musicology by the Trinity International University of Ambassadors, Atlanta, Georgia, with all the rights and privileges, on the 28th of October 2018.
